long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickSearch is a service designed to make your internet browsing experience easier and smarter. Instead of looking up a website and then using that website's search bar, you can search straight into the website. We support a number of popular websites, and you can also add your own.

If you login to QuickSearch, you can add your own websites and fine tune settings to make your experience even better.

The QuickSearch extension is now standalone, and is required for use of QuickSearch. The website will be taken down, soon.
